## GNSS locations for one female Northern Lapwing.

See [`nola125a`](../reference/nola125a.html) for more information on the dataset. 



```{r}
#| label: map-ruff
#| message: false
#| output-div: ruff

data(nola125a)

ctdf <- as_ctdf(nola125a, time = "timestamp") |>
  cluster_track()

map(ctdf)

summary(ctdf) |>
  head()

```
